estimators.estimators module¶

Created on 29 may. 2017

@author: Marc Casalprim

class estimators.estimators.Estimator(gyros, sc)¶

Bases: object

Class describing an estimator.

EST_FILENAME = 'est_dataframe'¶
GYROS_FILENAME = 'gyros_dataframe'¶
QUATS_FILENAME = 'quats_dataframe'¶
SC_FILENAME = 'sc_dataframe'¶
estimate()¶

Fills the self.est dataframe with the estimated data. self.est will have, at least, the columns RA,DEC,ROLL,biasX,biasY,biasZ All the subclasses will implement this “abstract” method, adding the desired parameters.

plot(save_folder=None, time_label='Time (frame number)')¶

Plot the estimated attitude and biases

save(folder='./')¶

Save the dataframes in pickle files
